item.title: Trump administration to announce plans to keep FBI in D.C.
item.description: President Trump’s plan to keep the FBI headquarters in D.C. involves moving the nation’s law enforcement agency to the Ronald Reagan Building downtown...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani calls himself a democratic socialist. Here’s what that means.
item.description: The 33-year-old candidate clinched the Democratic nomination for mayor of New York on Tuesday.

item.title: What the GOP’s tax bill means for your health care
item.description: Legislation passed by the Senate on Tuesday could affect how people sign up for Medicaid and the insurance marketplaces, and where they can get care.
